page.title: 02Location
page.content: In protrusion of Bucks halfway along Eastern border into Herts.On Western edge of Chiltern Hills halfway along them. Surrounding towns:_North_Leighton Buzzard 10kms,North East_Dunstable 12kms,East_Luton 22kms,South East_Hemel Hempstead 11kms,South_Berkhamsted 10 kms,South West_Chesham 11kms,Wendover 7kms,West_Aylesbury 10kms,North West_Buckingham 12kms,London 30 kms,The Coast 200kms. Most Marsworth people go 3 miles to Tring for day to day requirements of shopping,services and leisure.Larger towns for more variety e.g.shopping_Furniture,Marks And Spencer,Fresh fish_Services_Physiotherapy,Job centre,Hospital_Leisure_Cinema,Concert s,college.
